page.title: Triton
page.t: Triton was created as a prototype to test design ideas. Although it possesses a considerable amount of firepower for a ship of this size, the hull plating had to be thinned to create space for its power generation systems. The end result was a warship that is a cross between a heavy frigate and light destroyer.
High power hitech XS class Gause autocannon turret
High power hitech XS class Flak machinegun turret
